sentences: Lars Skoglund (born March 27, 1974 in Bodø, Norway) is a Norwegian composer and musician.
After finishing studies of musicology and philosophy at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology in Trondheim, he attended the Rotterdam Conservatory (1999-2003).
Skoglund work as freelance composer and was composer in residence from rom 2006 to 2008 for the Department of Art Studies at the Tromsø University College in Northern-Norway.
